website_summaries.verdict: Kids who love Minnie Mouse will carry this 18-inch plush doll with them everywhere they go.
pros: This plush Minnie Mouse doll has a pleasing feel that kids like for cuddling with during nap time or story time
Good size of doll at 18 inches tall
Classic  look for Minnie Mouse with polka dot pink clothing
Excellent detail in the look of this plush doll
Affordable price tag makes this toy a good value
cons: Stitch quality may not last over time
Not as soft as some other plush dolls

customer_reviews.title: Actual Product does not match item
customer_reviews.text: The Minnie I recieved does not match the picture at all. The pink is a hot pino. There’s no detailing on the shoes, the collar area is different as well and one ear is bend backwards and I cannot get it fixed. Also, the back of the toy has these straps like it’s a backpack with a zipper pocket. No where on the description does it say it’s a Minnie backpack. The purpose was for her to be able to sleep with it and now she can’t because of a choking hazard. Not at all what I thought I was going to recieve and I not a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: jil

customer_reviews.title: Not like the photo
customer_reviews.text: I received a smaller Minnie Mouse for my daughter that is not like the photo. The outfit is hot pink and the Minnie it's smaller. My sister ordered hers from the same seller and she received the Minnie Mouse as shown but I did not. Aside from that, it's a nice plush Minnie.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Love the product, Not so much the packaging..
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a 2-year-old that loves Minnie mouse. It's the perfect gift! It's a pretty big size, especially for a 2-year-old. It's well made, good quality, and has the original disney tag on the foot. The only thing I didn't really like was the way it was packaged when I received it. It literally just came in a plastic bag. Not a plastic grocery bag, but just a clear plastic bag that was tied with a knot. Not great presentation if you're thinking to send it directly to the recipient. I would get it sent to yourself first and put it in a gift bag if you care about packaging and presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Justina K

customer_reviews.title: I would like to share photos or pictures of the same
customer_reviews.text: I bougth the original MiniMouse; however, received an incorrect product that does not have the same specifications. The product that received has the serial # X0017BFNOF, I would like to share photos or pictures of the same. I need your help with the change as soon as I received it in Colombia.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: The picture doesn’t do Minnie justice! She is adorable! Super soft material and a beautiful quality plush shine. My son got a Mickey Mouse for his birthday and my daughter was upset she didn’t have a Minnie to match. Amazon to the rescue! She sleeps with her every night. It’s too cute to watch brother and sister holding Mickey and Minnie Mouse!
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: So soft and plush- my daughter LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this Minnie mouse for Christmas. I bought her 2 plush Minnie Mouses actually... One that lights up and sings and this one and she prefers this one leaps and bounds because of it's size and also how plush the fabric is. Since there are no batteries or anything in this one it is the perfect lightweight Minnie to get snuggly with and she takes her everywhere. Sooo glad I bought this for her for Xmas!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Smith

customer_reviews.title: The quality and construction are excellent and will no doubt be treasured by her for ...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves her Minnie Mouse. This stuffed toy is so darling and soft and huggable. The quality and construction are excellent and will no doubt be treasured by her for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Kempf

customer_reviews.title: Adorable stuffed Minnie Mouse doll.
customer_reviews.text: Soft and cuddly Minnie Mouse was given as a birthday gift for my 1 year old granddaughter. The doll is the perfect size, and my granddaughter takes her everywhere including in the highchair for meals and snacks. I guess you could say Minnie is her playtime best friend.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Heerdt

customer_reviews.title: Product not as described. Again.
customer_reviews.text: This is not the Minnie Mouse I ordered, which seems to be an alarmingly common issue. (I thought I’d take a chance because the price was right and returns are free, but it didn’t pay off this time!) Anyway, super lame. The bow is upside down; Minnie’s nose is turned up higher than a Real Housewife of Dallas; her mouth is deformed like she has a congenital birth defect. My wife and I agree it looks like the trash you win at a carnival. We ended up ordering one from the Disney Store online. Similar price tag, guaranteed quality.
customer_reviews.author: Colton Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Cheap knockoff!
customer_reviews.text: The Minnie I received does not match the picture at all. No bows on the shoes, the collar area is different you can hardly see it, it definitely doesn't have the official Disney stamp on the bottom of her foot, Bought this for my 2-year-old Granddaughters birthday wasn't happy when I saw it and it was too late to return it. she won't know the difference but I will it's pretty sad that the add shows one thing and you receive some different.
customer_reviews.author: JG (Highflyer)Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I love Minnie
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute, and much bigger than I expected. Again...my great niece is coming to the U.S. from Macedonia and cannot bring anything except her clothing. When asked her favorite toys, Disney made the top three. I'm trying to welcome her.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Item received is NOT what is advertised
customer_reviews.text: The item I received is a 16" 'Disney' Minnie Mouse Plush, but it is NOT like the one that is pictured at all. The dots on the dress are NOT embroidered, they're stickers that are ironed on. There are no bows on the shoes. The ears are a flimsy cardboard covered in a felt-type material. At best, I'd say this is a knock-off attempt of a Disney product. Definitely buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Penny G

customer_reviews.title: Real Minnie Mouse; soft and durable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 2yo girl and she absolutely loves it! She carries it around everywhere! It’s durable and soft, and it’s the REAL Disney plush, not an imitation. Be careful with the lower prices Minnies because they might not be the real Disney ones. For instance, compare the facial features and you’ll see a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Kwon

customer_reviews.title: Soft, beautiful and well sewn
customer_reviews.text: This is the softest, prettiest minnie and I was so glad to gift it to my granddaughter for christmas. Here it is 4 months later and she still looks brand new! It's been sewn perfectly and I can see it lasting a long time. I would highly recommend this beauty of a doll! The picture doesn't do it justice!
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: NOT 16"!!!
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because I just received this today & just opened up the box. Although it is very adorable & authentic, it is 18" tall!!! I bought the 16" Mickey Mouse, & it's shorter than Minnie Mouse. I am very upset. I intended for them to be the same3 size. Amazon: Why do you have this listed as a 16" doll?? This is a very deceiving & false description!! Then on the side it says 17"!!! What's the deal???
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Not as Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as a 16” doll. My granddaughter has a 16” Minnie and it’s a perfect size. That’s exactly why I bought this one. However, the Minnie sent to me is19”. If I wanted a 19” Minnie, I would’ve ordered one.
customer_reviews.author: Diane W

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Seam ripped after only 2 days of use. And by use I mean my 2 year old daughter walking around with it. For $17 it was not worth it. Going to try to contact the seller about replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P.

customer_reviews.title: Shop Wally World
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter had one we bought at Wal___t that she loved and lost it so I went about replacing it. Paid $18 for this one and found it again at Wal___t for $10 a couple days later.
customer_reviews.author: Trudi L. Royer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous quality, best doll ever
customer_reviews.text: Best doll I’ve ever seen, no doubt. Hard to part with. Gave to granddaugher as a “big sister” to her soon to be baby sister, who received a Disney Baby little version.
customer_reviews.author: doodlelady

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter since she's obsessed with Mickey mouse clubhouse. The Minnie doll seems well made, colorful, soft and durable. My daughter seems to love it , so money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: scott fennell

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: My two year old LOVES Minnie Mouse, so I purchased it for her. She hasn’t let it out of her sight since.
customer_reviews.author: krissy

customer_reviews.title: Our granddaughter Is in Love with it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely Love this Minnie. The colors are beautiful. She’s well made, It’s very nice. Great size for the price. It’s safe for our granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: T. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality item, true 18" size, daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality item, Daughter loves it. We recently went to Disneyland where we purchased a Plush Mickey for our nephews birthday, my daughter wanted it for herself, and she didn't want it to be given away. Some quick research on Amazon found this Minnie with free prime shipping too. I was able to order it and get it in time for the Mickey to be wrapped and given to our nephew. She loves this Minnie, and is always carrying it around the house with her. We have had it for a couple weeks now and seems to be holding up well to the constant attention.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fox

customer_reviews.title: IT'S CUTE AND PLUSH BUT NOT WHAT I PAID FOR
customer_reviews.text: It is ok it is cute and plush but its not the one in the picture its not as big or thick it smaller, has no Disney seal and its a cheaper version of Minnie mouse, it is the equivalent of going to the toy section of a drug store to buy a last minute gift . it is fine my niece will love it because she is 2 yrs old and she loves Minnie mouse . if your looking for something to serve it purpose it cool but if your looking for it to be what you see in the picture think again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only okay.
customer_reviews.text: It did not look very beautiful. I have minnie mouse already and was buying it for sister but had to return as it was not in good shape and it did not look that cute and giftable
customer_reviews.author: Ss

customer_reviews.title: Price Does Not Match the Minnie
customer_reviews.text: So $22.49 I thought was a good price for a 17 Minnie. However when I received Minnie the price tag was still on her that said $16.50. I think they sent me the wrong stuffed toy. Since the birthday party is tomorrow I have to keep it as it was meant to be a gift for a little girl's birthday party. However, If I had more time...I would send it back and ask for a refund and purchase elsewhere. I purchased this Minnie Mouse for a little girl's birthday party. It is exactly as stated in the measurements 17 inches, etc. and a beautiful stuffed toy. However I was verry disappointed in the price.
customer_reviews.author: teacher_chick

customer_reviews.title: So soft & cute!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr. old daughter loves Minnie Mouse. I got her this for Christmas & she loves it! It's so soft & cute!! She carries it everywhere, everyday. It was the perfect Minnie Mouse stuffed animal.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This is a darling Minnie! My granddaughter just loves her. She is well made and a perfect size for a three-year-old.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - as long as you get the Minnie pictured here!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when it was being supplied by ToyWorld. It was NOT the Minnie pictured, it was a much cheaper version. I sent it back (easy return, no problems with a refund) and bought directly from Disney. When we received the "real" Minnie from Disney (which is the one pictured here), she was perfect! Soft and lovable, our daughter loves it! With the easy return/refund, it may be worth trying your luck at getting the pictured one. If you're worried about it, buy directly from Disney.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: GOOD ITEM
customer_reviews.text: We bought this along with a few other Items For our Granddaughter. It wasn’t as big as I would have like... Hover it’s a nice doll.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: A child smile
customer_reviews.text: Minnie mouse doll from my friend little girl. We she wake up on Christmas day to see her toys. She will have a smile on face.
customer_reviews.author: antonio white

customer_reviews.title: daughter loved
customer_reviews.text: She's had it for a year and still plays with it, loves it. Big, soft and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Curt S. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Nice Minnie
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Happy toddler, and happy Mickey who now has his Minnie. No complaints here
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing how she was drawn to Minnie Mouse after randomly ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been avoiding Disney with my 1 year old because I'm not a big fan of the MM Clubhouse show. It's amazing how she was drawn to Minnie Mouse after randomly seeing her in a toy store. Walt Disney was a genius. This Minnie is well made and looks as though she'll be with us for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Wood

customer_reviews.title: cheap, carnival toy like material!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed...I guess my expectations were a little too high. While very cute, it is cheaply made and literally is made of the same stuff carnival toys are. It's a cheap, cheap polyester. Literally within the first day of my daughter playing with it the joint at minnie's foot and ankle gave and had a 1 inch slit....stuffing coming out and everything. I had to sew it back together that night. Save your money and hit the DIsney Store.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Donofrio

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Went Great with the birthday Décor, great item at a great price. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: NanaD

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: The product is good quality, the color is a bit different, but I think it’s even prettier from the photo. The kid loved it.
customer_reviews.author: F V

customer_reviews.title: beyond happy
customer_reviews.text: It was gift for my husband goddaughter and her birthday theme was Minnie and once she open her gift and saw it she was beyond excited she hold it all day even slept with it. We were very pleased she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Hazelgirl718

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Gave my 5 year old sister this for Christmas and she went on and on about how it was the best gift ever! There was absolutely nothing wrong with it and is made well!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. It works great
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It works great. Really soft to use. Much protective. I highly recommend this product for the people who want to buy a similar item. I purchased this product in a discounted price. I never expected that the product i would get the same for 80% cheaper than the market price.
customer_reviews.author: Sravanthi

customer_reviews.title: I question whether this is a genuine Disney product. ...
customer_reviews.text: I question whether this is a genuine Disney product. It does not come in a box and appears to be a knock off.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M.

customer_reviews.title: Not Good.: ( ”
customer_reviews.text: First and for most, My item was a day late it was supposed to be a gift for my daughter and now that I received it it wasn't the authentic mini mouse plush doll. On the picture it has the Disney stamp on the Mini Mouse shoe, on the item I received it does not have the stamp on it. Not Good. :( ”
customer_reviews.author: Lauriano Chino

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable!! A wonderful gift for my granddaughter - she loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: but I am terribly disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter has used the product for two days and the neck stitching is coming undone. She had held and hugged Minnie, but nothing that should cause her neck to start to come off. I can sew it, but I am terribly disappointed. Margaret
customer_reviews.author: margaret

customer_reviews.title: Great as Advertise.
customer_reviews.text: Got it on time, no complain, all same as advertise. Good PRoduct, i dont have any complain until now.
customer_reviews.author: LUIS

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift
customer_reviews.text: We gifted this to our nieces they absolutely loved them !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great and well made
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what others are marking it down for the one I got was made well and had Disney auth labling. I guess others ordered from diff source
customer_reviews.author: Jack Price

customer_reviews.title: My 2. 5 year old daughter loves this toy ...
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old daughter loves this toy! She never cared about plush toys much but has become inseparable from Minnie Mouse! The bow is supposed to come stitched up on each one of the ears... one side of the bow came detached from the ear. I think the stitch may have come loose during shipping. I still think it deserves 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: S. M.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bookbag. It is well made and sooooo cute. You won't be sorry if you purchase it. The little girl that I gave it to wears it all the time. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat A

customer_reviews.title: If fashon is what you seek...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had a Mickey doll and I was torn between this Minnie doll and one that talks... I'm glad I got this one. My daughter loves it. She sleeps with Minnie and Mickey every night. The doll seems like it's good quality and I got it for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Product came damaged. :(
customer_reviews.text: I usually dont like to complain, but I feel like this deserves a review. I thought the product was okay for the price and it was a decent doll I just didn't like that the leg was ripped. I'm disappointed. I got it just in time for my niece's birthday today just to realize it was poorly sewn. I'll just be sewing it together since my niece's party is today.
customer_reviews.author: arleyne

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Its an adorable Minnie Mouse and she loved it. very soft
customer_reviews.author: pam zygmunt

customer_reviews.title: Adorable - perfect size Minnie
customer_reviews.text: Bouht this for a 16 mth old and she loved it! Fit perfectly in her Minnie Mouse Car.
customer_reviews.author: dhsmith

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest most soft Minnie Mouse stuff animal. It was a gift and she loved it. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: vicki

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: Birthday present for granddaughter and she loved it best over all other gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Lerlene Roever

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Returning. Not as soft or nice as the other Disney characters I purchased. The minnie doll I received does not have the bows on her shoes as pictured. Ears are cardboard. This was going to be a gift for my 2 year old. Bummer
customer_reviews.author: likes to shop

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: Minnie is huge, and my 2-year-old loves her! We may have found a replacement for Pooh Bear...poor guy 🙃😜
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Clayburn

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Granddaughter loved her Minnie! Just right for her!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Grandma

customer_reviews.title: All logo, tabs are in the right places.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter requested for a gift for a friend who was also graduated Kindergarten these year and she chose this Minnie Mouse plush. The 6 years old recipient was very happy with the toy. The plush is as pictured, cute, and pretty big! The quality is something I would expect to buy from the Disney Store.
customer_reviews.author: Mixknickknacks

customer_reviews.title: I liked it so much that when I heard of another ...
customer_reviews.text: Second purchase for the same item intended for birthday gifts. I liked it so much that when I heard of another friend's birthday approaching I considered this to be the perfect gift. One girl was 4 and the other reached her first birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: It was absolutely perfect. My two year old great-niece opened it at her birthday party and never put it down!! If you have a "Minnie" fan, get them one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Riddlw

customer_reviews.title: Nice and big!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect gift and it was ordered standing in Target when I couldn't find one there!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mini Toy
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves her Mini, it has to go everywhere she does!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Dailey

customer_reviews.title: It’s face is really fat...weird looking compared to a previously purchased Mickey
customer_reviews.text: It’s face is really fat...weird looking compared to a previously purchased Mickey
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kwiatkowski

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Great material, ultra soft and durable. Bought for my 1 yr. old niece who loves Minnie. Holds up great and is still clean and super soft after couple months use. This product makes me want to buy all the characters because of how nice they are. Major difference with this being Disney sealed rather than a store bought one.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew

customer_reviews.title: It’s everything it’s advertised as
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a baby shower gift. The theme of the shower was mini mouse. The mother to be commented it is very soft and cuddly, she is pleased, which means I am too.
customer_reviews.author: Karen K.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, arrived on time. Durable, soft, true to the character.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hope your child enjoys it as much as mine does.

customer_reviews.title: Minnie Mouse
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. So far its still intact =)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Knowlden

customer_reviews.title: Minnie Mouse in Pink.
customer_reviews.text: This does not have the Disney Store patch on the foot.... other than that this plush Minnie fits the bill for my 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Cuddly!
customer_reviews.text: I don't really understand the negative reviews. I bought this for my granddaughter, who is stopping at my house en route to Disney World. Minnie is soft, well-made and, best as I can tell, original quality. This was also a great price. Can't wait to give this to my granddaughter and see her face.

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter absolutely loves Minnie! Great price compared to the Disney store

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toy. Great soft touch Washable And built tough....my daughter is very rough....and this toy withstands ....lol Shipping is great also arrived in a timely manner

customer_reviews.title: The one I received looked nothing like the one advertised!!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! These are imitation plush dolls and the one I received looked absolutely nothing like the one advertised on the photos. I returned it and am searching for the original Minnie plush.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Soft and durable.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. She’s 3 and it is half the size of her. She sleeps with it every night. She holds the stuffy by its limbs and swings it around. No issues yet with tearing or anything. I will update if anything happens.

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute & plush Mini Doll
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my 1.5 year old niece and she adores the doll like anything. Si happy with the size and quality.

customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter (2 years old) loves Minnie (whom she occasionally calls Micky). Minnie seems sturdy and has held up well so far.

customer_reviews.text: As described, authentic from DISNEY store. Nice size, not too small, not too big. Perfect size for my 3yr old to snuggle and carry everywhere!

It is the perfect size for a toddler. I would not hesitate to buy it again :)

customer_reviews.text: It's so cute. Looks like nice quality and exactly as described/pictured. I'm happy with it.

customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Very happy with this product. My niece loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves her new Minnie Mouse doll! And the best part for me? She hasn't figured out how to undress her yet, so this is the only doll in our house who is still wearing her clothes LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Actual product received was cheap compared to the picture. Returned.

customer_reviews.title: Just in time
customer_reviews.text: This is what my daughter asked for from Santa. It was last minute. Santa said he couldn't get one in time. Amazon helped him out. It got here in time and was exactly what she wanted.

customer_reviews.title: " So pleased. Have had to wash many times
customer_reviews.text: Can't go anywhere without "Big Minnie!" So pleased. Have had to wash many times, and only thing that's happened was her ears have curved in a bit. Excellent quality, excellent transaction.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my great niece 1st Birthday & she just loved it to death as well as her 2 year old brother wants to play with it as well... So glad I got this toy!!
